name: spelunker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who walks and climbs in caves as a sport: The Chauvet cave is named after the spelunker who discovered it in 1994. I need one of those head torches that spelunkers wear. Synonym
caverSee
spelunking
Ashley Cooper/The Image Bank/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe cave is popular with spelunkers.The state has asked cavers and spelunkers to avoid caves which may be bat habitats.The spelunkers climbed through rocky tubes 40m underground.
